summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2648, for the improvement of Leary Avenue from Fremont Avenue to 2nd Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same, construction wooden curbs and gutters; constructing watermains; constructing and reconstructing sewers and their appurtenances and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31111 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
